categories: Category:Starships of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: The Ziost Shadow was a Harrower-class dreadnought that served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and was named after the planet Ziost.
During the Cold War, it orbited Vaiken Spacedock.
The Ziost Shadow first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It serves as a flashpoint and operation starting area for Imperial players.
